#summary Use maven plug-in to compress javascript and css files

= Introduction =

Use maven plug-in to compress javascript and css files . (Support zk dsp extension!)
It extends from http://alchim.sourceforge.net/yuicompressor-maven-plugin/index.html .

= Details =

Write the definition in your project POM file.

{{{
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"  
xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
.
.
.
.  
<!-- add ZK repositories here -->
    <pluginRepositories>
      <pluginRepository>
        <id>zkrepo</id>
        <name>zk maven repository</name>
        <url>http://mavensync.zkoss.org/maven2/</url>
      </pluginRepository>
    </pluginRepositories>
.
.
    <build>
	<resources>
		<resource>
                        <!-- specify where the resources is. -->
			<directory>src/main/resources/</directory>
		</resource>
	</resources>
	<plugins>
                 <!-- add plug-in confiugration here -->
		<plugin>
			<groupId>org.zkoss.maven</groupId>
			<artifactId>yuicompressor-maven-plugin-zk</artifactId>
			<version>1.1.2</version>
		</plugin>
       </plugins>
    </build>
.
.
</project>
}}}

= Default Phase =

process-resources

= Default goal = 

compress

= Options =

*We Enhanced/Updated*
|| KEY || DEFAULT VAL||DESCRIPTION ||
|| maven.yuicompressor.sourcesuffix||.src||rename source to the specify suffix after compressed||
||maven.yuicompressor.linebreakpos||-1||we CHANGE the default to -1 ,because we offen use without any line-break  ||
||


* Original *
|| KEY || DEFAULT VAL||DESCRIPTION ||
|| file.encoding||UTF-8||||
|| preserveAllSemiColons||||
|| maven.yuicompressor.suffix||||
|| maven.yuicompressor.nosuffix||true||
|| maven.yuicompressor.nomunge||||
|| maven.yuicompressor.preserveAllSemiColons||||
|| maven.yuicompressor.disableOptimizations||||
|| maven.yuicompressor.force||||
|| maven.yuicompressor.gzip||||
|| maven.yuicompressor.statistics||||
|| maven.yuicompressor.jswarn||||
|| maven.yuicompressor.skip||||
|| maven.yuicompressor.failOnWarning||||


* Example for using maven.yuicompressor option *
{{{
<plugin>
	<groupId>org.zkoss.maven</groupId>
	<artifactId>yuicompressor-maven-plugin-zk</artifactId>
	<version>1.1.3.3</version>
	<executions>
		<execution>
			<goals>
				<goal>compress</goal>
			</goals>
		</execution>
	</executions>
	<configuration>
		<nosuffix>false</nosuffix>
	</configuration>						
</plugin>		
}}}
